dcfield_workflow_example

Workflow Example: Show complete research workflow from data to insight Style: Real data loading, preprocessing, analysis, visualization Audience: Researcher adapting to their own data

This example demonstrates a complete workflow for analyzing DC field effects in quantum wire semiconductor devices with realistic parameters.

Attributes

HAS_MATPLOTLIB

Functions

create_realistic_quantum_wire_data()

Create realistic quantum wire parameters and data.

analyze_dc_field_response(data, field_range)

Analyze DC field response over a range of field strengths.

analyze_momentum_distribution_evolution(data, Edc, ...)

Analyze how momentum distribution evolves under DC field.

create_comprehensive_visualization(data, ...)

Create comprehensive visualization of results.

main()

Main workflow example.

Module Contents

dcfield_workflow_example.HAS_MATPLOTLIB = True

Create realistic quantum wire parameters and data.

Analyze how momentum distribution evolves under DC field.

Create comprehensive visualization of results.
